description: Johnny Hazzard has a plan to train Ricky Larkin. Johnny is a famous trainer of athletes and Ricky wants to take his game to the next level. Johnny's unusual methods include sock sniffing, toe sucking and stomping. Ricky is up for all of them and after worshiping Johnny's socks and feet he allows the trainer to walk all over him - literally. Ricky gets naked and jerks off while Johnny stands on his hairy chest until the athlete blows his load on his new trainer's feet. Our first stomping scene - and it's a hot one
title: Johnny Hazzard Stomps Ricky Larkin
